issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
@nkoenig : I'm not sure what the previous one was. Every day I did testing on the cloud machines, I updated drcsim & gazebo across all 3 machines (fc1, fc2 and sim). We had 40Hz laser and 30Hz camera.

So as of the release on Thursday or Friday I didn't see this bug.
content.html:
